screenshots.description: Navigation to Payroll settings page showing Settings sidebar menu with Payroll option highlighted
screenshots.notes: Shows the main navigation path: Settings > Payroll

screenshots.description: Daily Wage Calculation section expanded showing table with three services: Salary proration (30.45 days), EOS leave encashment (22 days), and Unpaid leave deduction (30 days)
screenshots.notes: Table shows different calculation methods for three different services with their respective divisors

screenshots.description: Salary Proration configuration modal showing Month calculation dropdown (Custom days selected), Number of days field (30.45), and daily wage formula
screenshots.notes: Modal displays: Month calculation options, Number of days input, Salary components (Basic salary + allowances), and the calculated formula

screenshots.description: Month calculation dropdown expanded showing all three options: Working days, Calendar days, and Custom days (currently selected)
screenshots.notes: Dropdown shows all three calculation basis options available: Working days, Calendar days, Custom days. This validates that users can select between different calculation methods.

screenshots.description: Unpaid Leave Deduction modal showing table of eligible unpaid leave types with their individual daily wage calculations, and 'Overwrite calculation in policies' toggle
screenshots.notes: Table shows multiple leave types (Unpaid test, Days before setup test, Sic, etc.) each with their own calculation methods (30 days, Calendar days, Working days, 25 days). Toggle switch shows override functionality.

screenshots.description: Bottom section of Unpaid Leave Deduction modal showing 'Overwrite calculation in policies' toggle enabled, alert message about affecting 14 unpaid leave policies, and configuration fields for Salary Component, Month calculation, and Number of days
screenshots.notes: Alert message: 'This change will affect new requests in 14 unpaid - leave policies' clearly indicates override behavior. Configuration shows Salary Component dropdown, Month calculation (Custom days), and Number of days (30).

plan_3_salary_proration.notes: Validated calculation basis options and impact notice present in unpaid leave configuration

plan_4_leave_policy_unpaid.notes: Validated day calculation type options, override indicator, and explanation text visible in modal
